^ For Sterlite Electric Limited, Financial information derived from the company's restated statement of assets and liabilities as at March 31, 2023 is not comparable with the corresponding information as at March 31, 2024 and March 31, 2025.
Capital employed: Tangible net worth + Total borrowings (Long Term Borrowings + Short Term Borrowings) + Deferred Tax Liabilities (net)
$$ \text{Tangible Networth} = \text{Total Equity} - \text{Intangible Assets} - \text{Intangible assets under development} - \text{Right-of-use assets} $$
Source: Annual reports, Quarterly reports, Crisil Intelligence

^ For Sterlite Electric Limited, Financial information derived from the company's restated statement of assets and liabilities as at March 31, 2023 is not comparable with the corresponding information as at March 31, 2024 and March 31, 2025.
$$ \text{Fixed Assets} = \text{Gross value of Property, Plant and Equipment} + \text{Gross value of Right-of-use assets} $$
Source: Annual reports, Quarterly reports, Crisil Intelligence
